sentences.en: C 'é tait une mort subite, un arr ê t du coeur.

sentences.en: Comment en meurt - on? Et qu'est - ce qui reste apr è s cette mort?
sentences.cn: 问:是怎样如此死去的 呢 ?这死后还剩些什么?

sentences.en: En face, le village d'Argenteuil semblait mort.
sentences.cn: 对面, 阿让兜村象死了的一样.

sentences.en: Finally, using MORT to improve the air - traffic management safety.
sentences.cn: 最后, 引入MORT方法以提高空中交通安全管理的安全性.

sentences.en: Julian: [ to Mort ] Oh, shut up, you're so annoying!
sentences.cn: 朱利安: [ 对通知猎物已死的号角声 ] 哦, 闭嘴, 你如此令人感到懊恼!

sentences.en: Nous venons d'apprendre la mort de Jacques.
sentences.cn: 我们刚听说雅克去世了.

sentences.en: Prison life consists of mort routine.

sentences.en: Sorry, I cannot stop mort than a moment. Bye!
sentences.cn: 对不起, 我不能再多待一会儿啦, 再见!

sentences.en: With woman steps she followed : the ruffian and his strolling mort.
sentences.cn: 她迈着女性的步子跟在后边,恶棍和共闯江湖的姘头.

words.tran_cn: 许多；通知猎物已死的号角声

trans.tran_cn: 通知猎物已死的号角声，大量，许多
trans.tran_en: a call blown on a hunting horn to signify the death of the animal hunted
